post:
There is a lot of great Web Hosting Providers around. Depending on location you prefer and level of support you need, as well as some freebies that come with Hosting Package, you might be able to pick the right one.
If you are running small to medium size Business or planning to start your own website, AltusHost might be the right place for you.
In this topic we will try to explain why and hopefully see you as our Happy Client!

What we are giving with all Shared Web Hosting packages?

- Pure SSD Storage

- DDoS Protection

- Daily Backups
- Free Let's Encrypt SSLs
- Free Website Builder
- PHP version Selector
- Professional SPAM Filter
- Free CloudFlare CDN
- Guaranteed Resources
- No hidden fees or marketing/sales tricks!
- 100% Risk Free Trial - 45 Days Money Back Guarantee - No Questions Asked!
- Friendly & Professional 24/7 Technical Support
- Location: Netherlands
-----------------
